data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Malmo in the half of Sirius.
Malmo's Jo Inge Berget breaks free at Studenternas IP. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
In the minute 5, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
In Uppsala, Malmo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Isaac Thelin's header is off-target for Malmo.
In the minute 10, Kristoffer Karlsson awards Sirius a goal kick.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Malmo.
In the minute 11, Malmo needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Malmo at Studenternas IP.
Karl Larson for the home team is judged to be offside.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, An attacking Sirius player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Goal! Mohammed Saeid gives Sirius a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
In the minute 20, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Malmo.
In the minute 25, Malmo push forward at Studenternas IP and Anders Christiansen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sirius defence.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Uppsala Sirius attack through Nahom Girmai. The finish is off target, however.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for Malmo in Uppsala.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Kristoffer Karlsson awards Sirius a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Uppsala to check on Anders Christiansen, who is grimacing with pain.
Anders Christiansen is back on the pitch.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Malmo at Studenternas IP.
Sirius's Elias Andersson is on target but unsuccessful.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 34, Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius are caught offside.
Throw-in Sirius.
In the minute 36, Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Malmo.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Malmo at Studenternas IP.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Malmo.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a throw-in for Malmo, close to Sirius's area.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Malmo.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the home team a throw-in.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Uppsala.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Stefano Vecchia is on a sub for Jamie Roche for Sirius.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Own goal! Elias Andersson scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Sirius's Yukiya Sugita gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Yukiya Sugita of Sirius smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 54, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Stefano Vecchia.
In the minute 56, Mohammed Saeid with an assist there.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 58, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Malmo's Anders Christiansen has been booked in Uppsala.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Malmo make their first substitution with Jonas Knudsen replacing Behrang Safari.
In the minute 59, The away team have replaced Bonke Innocent with Soren Rieks. This is the second substitution made today by Jon Dahl Tomasson.
The away team replace Marcus Antonsson with Erdal Rakip.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Kristoffer Karlsson awards Sirius a goal kick.
Adam Hellborg for Sirius has been booked by Kristoffer Karlsson and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Sirius needs to be cautious. Malmo have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Ola Toivonen equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Malmo at Studenternas IP.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Henrik Rydstrom is making the team's second substitution at Studenternas IP with Kebba Ceesay replacing Mohammed Saeid.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
In the minute 73, Free kick Malmo.
Malmo surge into the attack at Studenternas IP but Ola Toivonenâ€™s header is off-target.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius just outside Malmo's area.
Sirius pushes forward through Stefano Vecchia, whose finish on goal is saved.
Malmo are whistled for offside.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Malmo at Studenternas IP.
Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a third substitution, with Laorent Shabani replacing Elias Andersson.
Stefano Vecchia for Sirius gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Malmo.
In the minute 81, Sirius are pushing forward but Stefano Vecchia's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
Malmo's Soren Rieks misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 82, Kristoffer Karlsson awards Sirius a goal kick.
Free kick for Malmo in the half of Sirius.
Goal kick for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Uppsala.
In the minute 84, Lukas Jonsson (Sirius) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Malmo have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Goal! Malmo have got their heads in front thanks to a Isaac Thelin strike.
Great play from Ola Toivonen to set up the goal.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Johan Dahlin for Malmo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 88, Adam Stahl is replacing Karl Larson for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Malmo's Johan Dahlin is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-5.
Malmo take a comfortable 2-4 lead thanks to Jo Inge Berget.
Jon Dahl Tomasson is making the team's fourth substitution at Studenternas IP with Adi Nalic replacing Ola Toivonen.
Goal! Soren Rieks extends Malmo's lead to 2-5.
Isaac Thelin instrumental with a fine assist.
